channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Heavy snow, dangerous cold could cause havoc for much of U.S. this weekend
item.description: Dangerously cold temperatures could be in store for more than half of the U.S. population through this weekend with rounds of heavy snowfall already i...

item.title: US exits World Health Organization, says agency strayed from 'core mission'
item.description: The U.S. has officially completed its withdrawal from the World Health Organization, HHS and the Department of State announced on Thursday.

item.title: Ryan Wedding, Olympic athlete turned alleged drug kingpin, is arrested, FBI says
item.description: Ryan Wedding, a 44-year-old Canadian national, was added to the FBI's Ten Most Wanted Fugitives list last year.

item.title: Texas and Oklahoma brace for snow and ice as winter storm barrels toward eastern two-thirds of US
Immigrants often don’t open the door to ICE, but that may no longer stop officers
Minnesota gears up for anti-immigration enforcement protest Friday despite dangerous cold
item.description: A vast network of labor unions, progressive organizations and clergy has been asking Minnesotans to stay away from work, school and stores Friday to p...

item.title: WATCH: Zoo elephants treated to 'spa day'
item.description: These elephants were treated to what their zoo called the “ultimate” spa day, complete with mud masks, pool time and dust bathing.

item.title: What is Rule 523 in bankruptcy?
item.description: Rule 523 dictates the debts you can't erase through bankruptcy (and the list might surprise you).

item.title: Winter storm live updates: At least 14 states declare state of emergency
item.description: More than 170 million people are on alert for a brutal weekend storm.

item.title: Ryan Wedding, former Olympian turned FBI most wanted fugitive, arrested
item.description: Ryan Wedding, the former Olympic snowboarder has been accused of being a major drug kingpin, was arrested Friday, multiple sources told ABC News.

item.title: 5 arrested in connection with shooting of judge, wife in Indiana
item.description: Five people have been arrested in connection with the Sunday shooting of a judge and his wife​ in Indiana, according to authorities.

item.title: School officials say 5-year-old was ICE "bait." DHS says he was abandoned.
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security disputes a Minnesota school district's claims that ICE agents used a 5-year-old boy as bait​ before taking the boy...

item.title: WATCH: Big Bend’s night skies put on celestial display
item.description: Michael Strahan visits Big Bend National Park in Texas for our “50 States in 50 Weeks” series, where the park and surrounding area were named an Inter...
